thread.section_title: The Latest from MNN - Mother Nature Network
thread.title: The meaning behind 17 cemetery symbols

author: Angela Nelson
title: The meaning behind 17 cemetery symbols
text:
The meaning behind 17 cemetery symbols By: Angela Nelson on Feb. 21, 2017, 8:23 a.m. 1 of 19 Rest in peace 
The thought of visiting a cemetery may make you uneasy, but these hushed places are so much more than the final resting place of a multitude of souls. 
As you stroll through — reading the names of the deceased, the inscriptions on their tombstones, and the symbols displayed on their graves — you may be surprised by a growing sense of calm as you learn the stories a cemetery can tell. Gravestone symbols offer a tiny glimpse into someone's former life — a way to share what they stood for long after they were gone. 
In fact, cemetery symbolism isn’t scary at all — it’s a beautiful, compelling part of these quiet green spaces. Here's what some of that symbolism means. 9 famous female aviators Rest in peace
